name: Mansion of Destiny
description:
CONTENT WARNING: Suicide, violence, death.

Mansion of Destiny began life as a game made for a year 11 software design class. I've polished it up somewhat since then, removing the more egregious of the typos and bugs, adding some sound effects - lots of little things. 

It's a relatively short text-based adventure game, revolving around exploring a mansion - as well as fighting a god or two.

There're some (admittedly somewhat surface level) similarities between this game and the plot of the third issue of Neil Gaiman's Sandman series, Dream a Little Dream of Me. There's no deep meaning for this - I was reading the Sandman at the time, and thought it was a good issue. Imitation is the most sincere form of flattery, or so "they" say. 

User instruction can be found in the readme file. If you have questions that can't be answered there, feel free to leave a comment on the itch page.

Not much more to say here, except thanks for stopping by, and I hope you enjoy my game.
